translations: 储备；储存（stockpile 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: The two leaders also approved treaties to cut stockpiles of chemical weapons.
sentences.translation: 两位领导人也都赞同削减化学武器储备的条约。

sentences.sentence: It remains lunacy to produce yet more coal to add to power stations' stockpiles.
sentences.translation: 发电站的积存如此多却还在生产更多的煤，这实在是荒谬。

sentences.sentence: Many poor countries have no stockpiles of the drug.
sentences.translation: 很多贫穷的国家没有药品储备。
